channel.title: VirtualBox on Corner case
channel.description: Recent content in VirtualBox on Corner case

item.title: My Network Config of (Sun)VirtualBox
item.description: Host: Windows XP Guest: ubuntu 8.04 Server VirtualBox Network Config: ubuntu network config: Why eth1 has address 169.254.4.130 ? Actually it depends. Start the VirtualBox with two network adapters and check all IP address in your host. You’ll see the IP address of the adapter for VirtualBox, then set the eth1 IP address accordingly.
